about_the_game:
Before you knew it, you were in the form of a traditional Japanese doll.
The adventure to regain the human body begins.

While pretending to be a doll so as not to be found by humans, use the items you have obtained to explore the mansion.

In the world of tsukumogami, it is considered taboo to see humans moving.
Therefore, if someone finds you, you are expected to pretend to be a doll and run away.

A little scary and sometimes sad adventure begins.

The demo version allows you to play the early stages of the game.
